whoami.text: A 3rd-year student studying Computer Science at the University of Michigan College of Engineering. Full-stack student developer interested in exploring bleeding-edge web technologies and server automation. Experienced in web systems, database management, and desktop and mobile app development.

languages.programming: C/C++, Java, Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, MatLab, Swift, SQL
languages.markup: HTML, XML, YAML, CSS, LaTex, Markdown, Mermaid
